title: France panorama. [No. 71/48]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Charlie Chaplin - revival of Chaplin’s pictures in Paris. Today’s theatre - scenic arrangements at Grenoble’s educational center. 2. Exploring the South Pole - Paul Emile Victor and the French Exploration Mission from Adelie Coast to the Soviet Vostok base. 3. The Postal Museum - the new Amboise Postal Museum. 4. Francis Bacon - The Francis Bacon Exhibition in Paris.
